## IPFSHttpClientProvider.(constructor)

Construct a provider using the ipfs-http-client

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  gateway | string | accepts a string, URL or options compatible for the create method |
